The expanding market for fine wines throughout the world has made it practically impossible to find remaining in the cellars of Burgundy any authentic red wines of older vintages of impeccable heritage and noble class. We had practically given up the search, when we ran into the good fortune of acquiring a unique collection from M. Roger Duchet, a man who has enjoyed the office of Mayor of Beaune for 30 years. As Mayor, it is M. Duchet’s privilege to open the annual auc- tion sale at the Hospices de Beaune.
